G

GestureController - Class in Controller
A class to create and recognize simple gestures using the relationship between two joints provided by SimpleOpenNI.
GestureController() - Constructor for class Controller.GestureController
Default Constructor: Initializes the control arrays and sets step to 0
GestureController.P - Class in Controller
Class to hold various information about joins and relation to each other and the other actions in sequence.
GestureController.P(int, int, Integer, Integer, Integer, boolean) - Constructor for class Controller.GestureController.P
The constructor called by Gesturecontroller.addPoint();
